about_the_game:
Around Every Corner (OUTDRIVE EDITION) is the music debut of Siberian electronic artist "The Foreign". A story-driven action pack, this 7-track EP packs a wide spectre of styles ranging from emotional Synthpop and Synthwave tracks to pounding Outrun Electro hits.

The Foreign summoned some of the best emerging Synthwave artists from US, France, Italy and Russia to contribute their productions and vocals to the EP, thus creating a sonic bond in their respective scene worldwide.
With “Around Every Corner”, The Foreign effectively puts Russia in the world map of retro-inspired electronic music; its top-notch production values and diversity of sounds are guaranteed to take you on a roller coaster ride of 80's-inspired electro music..

OUTDRIVE OST: THE FOREIGN

01 - In The Cold Of The Night
02 - StarRunners
03 - Up & On
04 - The Getaway
05 - Days Of Gaia
06 - The Streets Of 1987
07 - In The Cold Of The Night (Instrumental)

WAW format.
